title: Hour 2 - John Smoltz (06-05-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - John Smoltz (06-05-20)
description:
John Smoltz says the good news is that there will be games in the MLB this season. John says it will sound a lot different than ever before. He recalls a time that he could hear the lights buzzing in a stadium. John says that a veteran pitcher will be able to handle a short season better than a young rookie pitcher.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
